verbs.description: [ARG1: he] [V: was] [ARG2: afraid foreigners would yell at him so he let 160k in for free the] shinjuku gyoen national garden in tokyo lost more than 220 000 in revenue due to a scared employee the attendant a man in his early 70s recently admitted to investigators that because he was too frightened to ask foreign visitors to pay for their tickets he just let them guardian band tokyo guardian 160k japan shinjuku gyoen
